<Text: Lithophytes are plants that grow in or on rocks.>
Triplets:<Lithophytes
1:
--------------------
Text: Lithophyte:  Those that grow on rocks are also known as epipetric or epilithic plants.
Triplets:<Lithophyte
2:
--------------------
<Text: Lithophyte:  Lithophytes that grow on land feed off nutrients from rain water and nearby decaying plants, including their own dead tissue.>
Triplets:<Lithophytes
3:
--------------------
Text: Lithophyte:  Chasmophytes grow in fissures in rocks where soil or organic matter has accumulated.
